channel.title: Monitors now showing full size?
channel.description:
Well, I got a 22" monitor, and its not showing up the full size its showing up small and I've been messing with the adjustment settings but it makes it bigger in the little window
Heres a diagram
|--------------------------------- | | |----------------| | | | display area| | | | | | | |----------------| | |---------------------------------|
Edit: Nevermind I pressed some random button on accident and it fixed itself..
